entry.title: Unity Engine reversing and hacking
entry.summary: Introduction Unity3D is a popular game engine used by many games, like Escape from Tarkov, Rust, Fall Guys, Among Us, and many more. The engine uses C# as scripting backend, and by default runs on top of the Mono Runtime. Since C# assemblies get compiled to MSIL, we can easily reverse engineer them using tools like dnSpy.
